changes.title: Data
details: Added: V2.5.

changes.title: Patch Note Generator
details: Now group Champion Spells into group "Champion".

changes.title: Expedition
details: Added Data: V2.5
Bugfixed: Some Archetypes are not displayed.

changes.title: Database
details: Add indicator to copy LoRCode for each card.
Bugfixed: Targon's cards are now in the correct order.

changes.title: Expedition
details: Added: Deck Code for each archetype.
Update Data: V2.3 and V2.4 to match live

changes.title: Data
details: Added: V2.4.

changes.title: Patch Note Generator
details: Now will show additional Wiki link for each card.
Now the removed cards will be grayed out.
Now the cards only change flavor will be lighter.

changes.title: Expedition
details: Reworked - Used to display list and compare archetypes between versions.
Added Data: V2.3 and V2.4

changes.title: Text Formatter
details: Renamed from old Expedition - Use to replace the text card with Database.

changes.title: Database
details: Add button able to close all Details.

changes.title: Patch Note Generator
details: Added: Toggle for removed cards.
Updated: Now show the Card Name and Card Code on the right as V1.2.1 version.
Now toggle is disabled if there are no cards in that category.
Now will sort by Card Type, Name and then Card Code.
The list will now be grouped by Card Type.

changes.title: Database
details: Added: Clear button for Card Text Search.
Added Sorts: Power (Descending), Health (Descending).
Updated: Update icons to latest.

changes.title: Data
details: Updated: V2.3 to match live.

changes.title: Patch Note Generator
details: Bugfixed: Now arrange associated cards in their correct order, eg T10 will be after T9.
Bugfixed: Fixed display issue when adding or changing Keywords.
Bugfixed: Fixed issue of not recognizing Focus spell speed.

changes.title: Database
details: Removed: No longer able to click on Card Code to view Card Detail.

changes.title: Data
details: Updated: V2.3 until day 2021/03/01.

changes.title: Database
details: Added Card Detail: Now can click on Card Code or Card Image to see more basic details like Flavor or Full Artwork.
Now will automatically search the first time access.

changes.title: Data
details: Updated: V2.3 until day 2021/02/27.

changes.title: Database
details: Added Filter: Cost.
Added Card Search: Card Code.
There will now be a link to the League of Legends Wiki for each card.
Reduce the size of the filter part.
Bugfixed: Now arrange associated cards in their correct order, eg T10 will be after T9.

changes.title: Data
details: Updated: V2.3 until day 2021/02/24.

changes.title: Patch Note Generator
details: Now use lazy loading for image, like Database.

changes.title: Database
details: Added Filters: Collectible and Card Search.
Added Sorts: Name, Code and Cost.

changes.title: Data
details: Updated: V2.3 until day 2021/02/22.

changes.title: Patch Note Generator
details: Updated: Now use all local files as database, instead of qualifying.
Bugfixed: Fix some typos.

changes.title: Expedition Generator
details: Updated: Now use all local files as database, instead of qualifying.

changes.title: Database
details: Introduced - Use to searching for your cards.
Filters: Region, Set and Card Type.

changes.title: Data
details: Introduced - V2.3 until day 2021/02/21.
Bugfixed: Add missing data of V1.7.

changes.title: Patch Note Generator
details: Updated Layout: Table display with old and new card images (if any).

changes.title: About
details: Introduced - With Change Logs.

changes.title: Data
details: Updated: V2.3 until day 2021/02/20.

changes.title: Patch Note Generator
details: Add toggle for added and changes cards.

changes.title: Data
details: Added: V2.2, V2.3 until day 2021/02/29.

changes.title: Data
details: Added: From V0.9.1 to V2.1.

changes.title: Patch Note Generator
details: Now able to use site data, it is not necessary using local files.
Now can hover on Card name to see card image.

changes.title: Expedition Generator
details: Now able to use site data, it is not necessary using local files.

changes.title: Patch Note Generator
details: Introduced - Used to collect changes to Patch Note, as well as for writing Patch Note on Wiki.

changes.title: Expedition Generator
details: Introduced - Use to replace the text card related to the Expedition of Patch Note.
